snippet: Striker Jozy Altidore had a disappointing season in the Premier League, scoring one goal, but United States Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said he expected Altidore to have a “very special” World Cup.
abstract: Striker Jozy Altidore had a disappointing season in soccer's Premier League, scoring one goal, but United States men's coach Jurgen Klinsmann says he expects him to reach his potential and end his scoring slump at 2014 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Striker Jozy Altidore had a disappointing season in the Premier League, scoring one goal, but United States Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said he expected Altidore to have a “very special” World Cup.

headline.main: U.S. Counts on Altidore to End His Drought
headline.print_headline: U.S. Counts on Altidore to End His Drought

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
